titleStmt.title: An answer for Mr. Calamie to a poem congratulating his imprisonment in Nevv-gate. Intituled by Robert Wilde. D.D. Author of the late Iter Boreale. / By J.R. Author of the late Small-Beer poem. Sic. partis componere Magna.
titleStmt.author: J. R.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "THE place your Worship, doth congratulate ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
